summary: Provides an abstract framework for handling well information without reliance on a specific grid layout, offering utilities to assign wells to model layers, generate cell identifiers, build dataset variables and data frames, validate depth attributes, convert data from external formats, determine package compatibility, apply masks, render visualizations, and export well definitions to MODFLOW 6 package structures and files.
business_intent: Empower groundwater modelers to incorporate and manage well data in a gridâ€‘independent manner, simplifying preparation, validation, visualization, and translation of wells into MODFLOW 6 packages for simulation workflows.
